about: Hey there! I'm Faiyaz, a Software Engineer based in Pune, India. I'm interested in application development and I always enjoy learning new things to improve my skills. I'm also fascinated by other computer science fields like Artificial Intelligece.
Apart from the technical stuff, I'm also interested in Badminton üè∏ and Astronomy üî≠.

summary: Working as a Java backend engineer developing backend systems for Rheumatology healthcare service.
Built code-gen tool to generate SQL from Excel for easy maintenance of data
Optimized backend performance and refined code architecture
Utilized Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, AWS
Engineered REST microservices to enhance system performance and reduce latency
Developed library for processing large Excel files and implemented caching for optimized inter-service communication
Collaborated with team to ensure code quality, demonstrate features to clients, and resolve system issues
Utilized Java, Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA, Spring Security, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis in projects

projects.name: Banking Application API
projects.description: Developed a functional REST API for a demo banking application, following coding best practices and industry standards

projects.name: Grievance System API
projects.description: Designed an anonymous grievance reporting and management approach that reduces 90% manual effort.

projects.name: ClubSocial
projects.description: Created a social media website using Firebase & React, where users can post their ideas as messages, photos, and videos
